steam-rom-manager.name: Steam ROM Manager
steam-rom-manager.description: Used to sync RetroDECK favorites and Launcher with Steam

automatic_steam_sync.name: Automatic Steam Sync
automatic_steam_sync.description: Enable / Disable: Automatic Steam Sync (ES-DE favorites will be synced to Steam when RetroDECK quits).

manual_steam_sync.name: Manual Steam Sync
manual_steam_sync.description: Perform a one-time manual sync of ES-DE favorites to Steam.

purge_steam_sync.name: Purge Steam Sync Shortcuts
purge_steam_sync.description: Performs a full Steam ROM Manager purge of all synced shortcuts in Steam (in case things have gotten messed up).
